summary: Aballay was a bad tempered gaucho. After killing a man, the terrified look of the victim's son raised his consciousness about his savagery. Years go by, that kid's look doesn't leave him. Aballay knows that the kid will look for him.
cast: Pablo Cedrón|Nazareno Casero|Claudio Rissi|Mariana Anghileri|Luis Ziembrowski|Aníbal Guiser|Lautaro Delgado|Tobías Mitre|Horacio Fontova|Gabriel Goity|Fernando Spiner
title: Aballay, el hombre sin miedo
